features.name: User Authentication
features.description: User sign up, login, logout, and session management using Supabase Auth

features.name: AI Project Idea Generation
features.description: Generate personalized project ideas using OpenAI GPT-4o-mini based on user preferences (type, domain, complexity, technologies, skill level)

features.name: Project Dashboard
features.description: Display user's recent projects, saved projects count, and quick actions

features.name: Project Ideas Display
features.description: Show generated project ideas in a grid layout with filtering and sorting

features.name: Project Details
features.description: View detailed information about a specific project including overview, technologies, roadmap, and documentation

features.name: AI Documentation Generation
features.description: Generate comprehensive project documentation using Google Gemini API

features.name: Landing Page
features.description: Marketing landing page with features showcase and call-to-action

features.name: Supabase Integration
features.description: Database client, types, and queries for projects, profiles, and saved projects

features.name: UI Components
features.description: Reusable UI components using shadcn/ui library (buttons, cards, forms, etc.)

features.name: Routing
features.description: Application routing configuration with protected routes and navigation

features.name: Responsive Design
features.description: Mobile-responsive layouts and adaptive UI components
